name: HIVE: Altenum Wars
description: HIVE is a multiplayer hero shooter in 2.5D side scroll with futuristic style and frenetic gameplay. Up to 10 players will have to fight in hexagon-shaped combat areas, divided into 6 zones, each one with Its own gravity direction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 / AMD Athlon II X3 455 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 430/ AMD Radeon R5 240 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
